mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO CRM_OWNER_USER.BI_TCARD_INFO_IMP_T ( MONTH_PART, EPARCHY_CODE, USER_ID, SERVICE_ID, CALL_TYPE, CALL_TYPE_DESC, NET_TYPE, NET_TYPE_DESC, DURATION, CALL_TIME, STATUS, IN_DATE, NOTE)
SELECT #{item.MONTH_PART,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.EPARCHY_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.USER_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.SERVICE_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE WHEN #{item.CALL_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '被叫' THEN 0 WHEN #{item.CALL_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '主叫' THEN 1 END, #{item.CALL_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE WHEN #{item.NET_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '本网' THEN 0 WHEN #{item.NET_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '异网' THEN 1 END,#{item.NET_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.DURATION}, #{item.CALL_TIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},0,sysdate, null FROM DUAL
